name: Not Yeti
description:
What would you do if you need to race a Yeti for your survival?

Well, you should play this game, or Not Yeti. :)

  • - CONTROLS -
  • A - decrease speed
  • D - increase speed
  • SPACEBAR -jump/doublejump
  • Mouse Left - shoot icicle
  • Mouse Right - ICE ramps and magic

- OBJECTIVE -

Get to the finish line before the Yeti to win!
